workflow.name: Automate peer review assignments with GPT-4-nano, Slack and email notifications
workflow.description:
## Introduction
Automate peer review assignment and grading with AI-powered evaluation. Designed for educators managing collaborative assessments efficiently.
## How It Works
Webhook receives assignments, distributes them, AI generates review rubrics, emails reviewers, collects responses, calculates scores, stores results, emails reports, updates dashboards, and posts analytics to Slack.
## Workflow Template
Webhook ‚Üí Store Assignment ‚Üí Distribute ‚Üí Generate Review Rubric ‚Üí Notify Slack ‚Üí Email Reviewers ‚Üí Prepare Response ‚Üí Calculate Score ‚Üí Store Results ‚Üí Check Status ‚Üí Generate Report ‚Üí Email Report ‚Üí Update Dashboard ‚Üí Analytics ‚Üí Post to Slack ‚Üí Respond to Webhook
## Workflow Steps
1. Receive & Store: Webhook captures assignments, stores data.
2. Distribute & Generate: Assigns peer reviewers, AI creates rubrics.
3. Notify & Email: Alerts via Slack, sends review requests.
4. Collect & Score: Gathers responses, calculates peer scores.
5. Report & Update: Generates reports, emails results, updates dashboard.
6. Analyze & Alert: Posts analytics to Slack, confirms completion.
## Setup Instructions
1. Webhook & Storage: Configure endpoint, set up database.
2. AI Configuration: Add OpenAI key, customize rubric prompts.
3. Communication: Connect Gmail, Slack credentials.
4. Dashboard: Link analytics platform, configure metrics.
## Prerequisites
- OpenAI API key
- Gmail account
- Slack workspace
- Database or storage system
- Dashboard tool
## Use Cases
- University peer review assignments
- Corporate training evaluations
- Research paper assessments
## Customization
- Multi-round review cycles
- Custom scoring algorithms
## Benefits
- Eliminates manual distribution
- Ensures consistent evaluation

workflow.name: AI-Powered Peer Review Assignment System with Automated Rubric Generation

parameters.text:
=You are an expert engineering educator evaluating student assignments.

Assignment Title: {{ $json.assignmentTitle }}
Student Name: {{ $json.studentName }}
Submission: {{ $json.submissionUrl }}

Generate a comprehensive peer review rubric with the following criteria:
1. Technical Accuracy (0-25 points)
2. Problem-solving Approach (0-25 points)
3. Documentation Quality (0-20 points)
4. Code/Design Quality (0-20 points)
5. Innovation and Creativity (0-10 points)

For each criterion, provide:
- Clear evaluation guidelines
- Specific examples of excellent, good, and poor performance
- Key questions reviewers should ask

Total: 100 points

Format the rubric in a clear, structured way that peer reviewers can easily follow.

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant that creates detailed, fair assessment rubrics for engineering students.

parameters.html:
=

Peer Review Assignment

Dear Reviewer,

You have been assigned to review: {{ $json.assignmentTitle }}

Student: {{ $json.studentName }}

Due Date: {{ $json.dueDate }}

View Submission

Evaluation Rubric

{{ $('Generate Review Rubric').item.json.output }}

Please complete your review by the due date.
parameters.subject: =Peer Review Assignment: {{ $json.assignmentTitle }}

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "success": true,
  "message": "Peer review assignments distributed successfully",
  "assignmentId": "{{ $json.assignmentId }}",
  "student": "{{ $json.studentName }}",
  "reviewersAssigned": {{ $json.reviewers.length }},
  "rubricGenerated": true,
  "status": "{{ $json.assignmentStatus }}"
}

parameters.text:
=Generate a comprehensive final assessment report for the following peer review results:

Assignment ID: {{ $json.assignmentId }}
Student ID: {{ $json.studentId }}
Completed Reviews: {{ $json.completedReviews }}
Average Score: {{ $json.averageScore }}/100
Final Grade: {{ $json.finalGrade }}

Provide:
1. Executive Summary (2-3 sentences)
2. Strengths identified across reviews
3. Areas for improvement
4. Specific actionable recommendations
5. Comparison to class average (assume 75/100)
6. Next steps for the student

Format as a professional academic report.

options.systemMessage: You are an experienced engineering educator creating fair, constructive assessment reports.

parameters.html:
=

Peer Review Complete

Final Grade: {{ $json.finalGrade }} ({{ $json.averageScore }}/100)

Report Summary

{{ $('Generate Final Report').item.json.output }}

Reviewed by {{ $json.completedReviews }} peers
parameters.subject: =Final Peer Review Report: {{ $json.assignmentId }}

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.
